name: Cart Checkout Confirmation
author: ANDShop

sections.description:
Cart Checkout Confirmation is a plugin that allows you to insert a confirmation popup between WooCommerce’s checkout screen (the page where you enter the customer information) and the checkout completion screen.

It also has a pro version to upgrade your plugin.
Enabling you to
・choose between a confirmation popup or a page
・change and reorder the items on the confirmation page by simple drag and drops
・change the color of the confirmation button
・change the confirmation button’s text
・put a text in the confirmation page between the Purchaser Information and the Cart Information
sections.installation:
1. Cart Checkout Confirmation can be installed directly through your WordPress
    Plugins dashboard.
  2. Click “Add New” and Search for “Cart Checkout Confirmation”
  3. Install and Activate
sections.faq:
Some of the elements can’t be clicked!

That is becasue some contents are only available when the pro version of this plugin is enabled. To see the pro version click here.
sections.changelog:
1.0.1 – 2022-10-12

*Dev – Add shipping fee field to Cart Checkout Confirmation.
*FIX – Change the text to Japanese on the confirm screen button when opening with popup.
*Dev – Create on and off mode for text “billing” displayed at the top of each field on the paid version.
*Dev – Can change button and background color of order text “confirm” in popup on the paid version.

1.0.2 – 2023-2-16

Updated Translation Files
